itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with 2 Broke Girls star Jonathan Kite and our old friend Jamie Kaler to discuss why they can't do commercials, overused impressions, the difficulty of being a voice-over actor, why Mark Wahlberg aw...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with 2 Broke Girls star Jonathan Kite and our old friend Jamie Kaler to discuss why they can't do commercials, overused impressions, the difficulty of being a voice-over actor, why Mark Wahlberg aways sound out of breath, and why podcasts are getting higher ratings than cable tv shows.

Ross Patterson, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with 2 Broke Girls star Jonathan Kite and our old friend Jamie Kaler to discuss why they can't do commercials, overused impressions, the difficulty of being a voice-over actor, why Mark Wahlberg aways sound out of breath, and why podcasts are getting higher ratings than cable tv shows.
